entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%

High minus 3. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023
